description: Learn how to transform a few simple ingredients into a vibrant spring salad with this speedy chickpea, beetroot and chicken salad recipe.
name: 4-Ingredient Spring Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375 g Woolworths COOK Vietnamese style chicken kebabs
70 g canned Edgell chickpeas with zesty vinaigrette

recipeInstructions.text: Divide salad among bowls. Top with undrained chickpeas and drizzle with remaining dressing. Serve.
